overview:
Michael is the Marketing Director of Zapd, a company in the Curious Office portfolio, and has been involved in the Creative Direction and Social Media Marketing for the release of Version 2.0 of the Zapd mobile application for iOS. (Zapd was App of the Week in the iTunes store with extremely high user reviews)

An experienced detail-oriented executive with over 20+ years in the Luxury Retail, Fashion and Print industries, he comes to the table with extensive experience in Product Design and Development, Project Management, Sourcing experience both nationally and internationally as well as a strong Public and Press Relations background.

Prior to the sale of the graphics design marketplace and e-commerce site Inkd, another Curious Office company, Michael worked directly with many of the company’s national and international clients as Managing Director.

In addition to extensive buying, sales and creative direction experience, Michael has developed and implemented detailed project and order tracking systems as well as product specific, detailed, COG and overhead/expense tracking systems.

He has also worked on the art and content packaging for the total revamp of a world renowned Sonoma based winery website.

Specialties Creative direction; Business development; Development and implementation of sales and marketing strategies for online and bricks & mortar venues; Brand development; Developing relationships & additional revenue streams with major national and international vendors; Product design & development; Sourcing-Both nationally and internationally; Development of targeted statistics tracking systems. Increasing net profitability; Strategic planning; Budget/Sales forecasting; Social media and in-bound marketing.
